ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Item Dropping/Trading (was: minotaur horn change?)
ygData.msgSnippet: So you need a level 52 druid to power level, I went to my local power leveling market andgot me one of fancy Level 52 Vicars to help.  No wonder I was so
ygData.messageBody:
So you need a level 52 druid to power level, I went to my local power
leveling market andgot me one of fancy Level 52 Vicars to help. No wonder
I was so confused when I leveled at the same rate as before.... Bard
melee is not good enough to abuse the free healing of the cleric.

Treilanin Loreweaver
Bard of the 39th song
Karana

On Fri, 2 Jun 2000, Jeffrey Sue wrote:

> At 04:46 PM 6/2/00 -0400, you wrote:
> >*sigh* As much as the speculation that we are making in how this
> >change/option will be implemented, we are all forgetting one fact.....
> >None of us have access to the code and hence do not know what needs to be
> >done. Everyone's points have merit in how such a change can be
> >implemented. So let's move on.... I would much prefer a nice thread on
> >how to power level me to level 40 =)
>
> get a nice level 52 druid to hang out with you for a while =)
>
>
> >Treilanin Loreweaver
>
>
